description.value: You've learned devious ways to make the most of your grippli weapons. Whenever you critically hit using a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Blowgun]{Blowgun}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Hatchet]{Hatchet}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Scythe]{Scythe}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Shortbow]{Shortbow}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Composite Shortbow]{Composite Shortbow}, or grippli weapon, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse
